description: This json file contains the corrections for four AK8 X->bb taggers: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD, btagDDBvLV2 (i.e. DeepDoubleX), deepTagMD_ZHbbvsQCD (i.e. DeepAK8-MD), btagHbb (i.e. the double-b tagger), and three AK8 X->cc taggers: particleNetMD_XccvsQCD, btagDDCvLV2, deepTagMD_ZHbbvsQCD. Presented corrections are derived from three individual methods (sfbdt/mutag/zbb) and their combination (comb). Corrections are based on three fixed working points (L/M/T) and three pT bins (450-500, 500-600, >600). If only one era of data is analyzed, the 'up' and 'down' systematics can be used. If data from multiple eras is analyzed, 'up/down_correlated' and 'up/down_uncorrelated' systematics are provided to be used instead of the 'up/down' ones, which are supposed to be correlated/decorrelated between the different data eras.

corrections.name: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD_wp_values
corrections.description: working points for particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD in UL 2018.

corrections.name: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD_sfbdt
corrections.description: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD working point scale factors via the sfBDT method for UL 2018 signal X->bb jets.

corrections.name: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD_mutag
corrections.description: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD working point scale factors via the mu-tagged method for UL 2018 signal X->bb jets.

corrections.name: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD_zbb
corrections.description: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD working point scale factors via the boosted Z->bb method for UL 2018 signal X->bb jets.

corrections.name: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD_comb
corrections.description: particleNetMD_XbbvsQCD working point scale factors via all methods combined for UL 2018 signal X->bb jets.
